class.rdfs:comment: A PerformanceRole is a Role that some entity places with regard to a theatrical performance, e.g. in a Movie, TVSeries etc.
class.rdfs:label: PerformanceRole

schema:characterName.rdfs:comment: The name of a character played in some acting or performing role, i.e. in a PerformanceRole.
schema:characterName.rdfs:label: characterName
